column4: somethings happened to my ubuntu. ok heres what it is: loading grub, then i select ubuntu, then going loading and after that something is happening... wrong colors on the display and in the center ubuntu logo... the action can be maked... i type user and then i type a pass... everythings are going fine with that.. but this display (wrong colors and in the center ubuntus logo are not disappearing) what to do?
ask your question and someone might if he/she has the answer
